item.title: Config Mirror Source Of Ubuntu
item.description: Set mirror source of Ubuntu For Ubuntu20.04 Set mirror source Backup sources.list file cd /etc/apt/ sudo cp sources.list sources.list.bak Edit sources.list file sudo vi sources.list Mirror of USTC deb https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal main restricted universe multiverse deb-src https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb-src https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-backports main restricted universe multiverse deb-src https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/ubuntu/ focal-backports main restricted universe multiverse deb https://mirrors.

item.title: Build Hugo By GitHub Action
item.description: Build Hugo By GitHub Action Take macOS for example. Front Environmental Conditions Install Git Install Go version 1.18 or later Install Hugo And Config install brew install hugo; test hugo version; new site hugo new site {name} themes Take stack for example. git clone https://github.com/vaga/hugo-theme-m10c.git themes/m10c configration echo "theme = 'm10c'" >> config.toml post hugo new post/{file name}.md preview hugo server -D Build By Github Action TODO
